page.title: 15Bayston Hill Police Station.
page.content: In the police station there are two offices,an interview room,a toilet,but no cells.This office covers an area larger than Manchester,stretching from Cound to Chirbury.To do this there are four officers in Bayston Hill with five more based at Atcham,Cressage, Chirbury,Pontesbury and Ford. Every morning they have to drive into Bayston Hill to look at the notices. They patrol in cars linked by radio to the computer at Worcester.This tracks them each time they call in so that it can work out which car is nearest to the scene of emergencies. Things like stray dogs and lost property are passed on to headquarters in Shrewsbury.In Bayston Hill they deal with complaints like noise and vandalism.In the countryside they have calls to stray animals,accidents on farm machinery,and fires.
